item.title: First-Line Osimertinib Plus Chemo Extends Survival in NSCLC
item.description: The FLAURA2 trial establishes a new standard of care for EGFR-mutated NSCLC, according to the authors of new research. Medscape Medical News

item.title: NSCLC Survival Benefit Seen With EGFR-TKI + Chemo
item.description: Median PFS benefit was just over 3 months in patients with EGFR-mutant NSCLC who had tumor suppressor gene co-mutations. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Osimertinib's Benefits in NSCLC Can Extend Beyond First Line
item.description: Patients with EGFR-mutated NSCLC who progress on first-line osimertinib live longer without disease worsening when the drug is maintained alongside ch...

item.title: Perioperative Nivolumab Does Not Sacrifice QoL in NSCLC
item.description: Perioperative nivolumab in eligible patients with resectable non-small cell lung cancer offers improved survival outcomes and preserves quality of lif...

item.title: Does Eating Red Meat Actually Raise Your Cancer Risk?
item.description: Daily processed meat consumption slightly increases colon cancer risk, but occasional consumption is far less concerning than headlines suggest. Medsc...
